simpleText: A Request to Voice the Rohingya Community’s Struggles to the International Audience.  Dear Dhruv Rathee,  I hope this message finds you well. My name is [Your Name], and I am a member of the Rohingya community, a group that has faced unimaginable challenges and persecution. As someone who deeply appreciates the work you do in raising awareness on important social and global issues, I am reaching out to you with a humble request.  The Rohingya people have endured decades of statelessness, discrimination, and violence, leading to a humanitarian crisis that remains largely underreported and misunderstood. Despite the dire situation, our voices often go unheard, and our stories remain untold on the global stage.  I believe that your platform has the power to shed light on our plight and bring attention to the injustices faced by my community. By addressing the Rohingya crisis on your channel, you could play a crucial role in educating your international audience about the ongoing struggles we face and the urgent need for global intervention.  Your ability to articulate complex issues in a clear and compelling manner makes you an ideal advocate to help amplify our voices. It is my sincere hope that you would consider dedicating an episode or segment to the Rohingya crisis, helping to bring our story to those who might otherwise never hear it.  Thank you for taking the time to consider my request. Your support could make a significant difference in our fight for justice, peace, and recognition. I pray that God blesses you abundantly for your efforts in spreading truth and awareness.  We Rohingya online users love to watch you because your explanation is very clear.  Sincerely RM Aziz.
author: @Thebeautifulworld-1

simpleText: लो भाई ,   पेरिस ओलम्पिक मे 50kg केटेगिरी का गोल्ड लेकर गई , अमेरिकी खिलाडी , साराह भी , 55kg की खिलाडी थी ।            विनेश को बेईमान , चीटर, दूसरे का हक मारने वाली , धोखा देकर लोअर वेट कैटेगिरी मे लडने वाली बताने वालो , इस पर भी थोडा बोन डेंसिटी , ओरिजनल वेट , शरीर की संरचना और बनावट वाला ज्ञान तो पेलना  बनता है ।                विनेश तो खैर , 53 kg से 50 kgमे आई थी । ये तो 55 kg से , किसी का हक मारकर 50kg मे आई थी ।        और हाँ , 30 साल की साराह , उम्र मे भी  29 साल की विनेश से बडी ही है ।   ★ "हैंड ऑफ गॉड" याद है? 1986 के फुटबॉल विश्व कप में स्वर्गीय मैराडोना ने हाथों से गोल कर अर्जेंटीना को विश्व कप जीता दिया था..  ★ पूरी दुनिया ने मैराडोना की इस बे-ईमानी को देखा था..सब को मा'लूम था कि मैराडोना ने चोरी की थी..पर सब "नशे में वाह वाह" कर रहे थे..  ★ सब ख़ामोश रहे..FIFA ने भी कोई कार्रवाई नहीं की थी..सुबूत होने के बावजूद किसी भी खेल में ये सब से बड़ी बे-ईमानी थी जिसे कामयाबी का नाम दिया गया था..  ◆ "100 ग्राम वज़्न ज़्यादा था" : ये "हैंड ऑफ नॉनबायोलॉजिकल" है जिसे ऊपर से दाहिनी तस्वीर में दिखाया है..  ◆ सब को सब कुछ मा'लूम है..पर सब ने "शोकसभा" में बैठने का तए किया है..बे-ईमानी में "कभी ख़ुशी कभी ग़म"..  👉 अगर विनेश फाइनल खेल लेती तो "पहलवानों का यौन शोषण" का मुद्दा' इंटरनेशनल लेवल पर वापिस ज़िंदा हो जाता.."महादानव" को बहुत कुछ सामना करना पड़ता..  👉 अगर विनेश गोल्ड मेडल जीत जाती तो "महादानव" को विनेश को फोन करना पड़ता..विनेश को फोन करने की मजबूरी अपने आप में ज़िल्लत का सबब बनती..  👉 और मान लीजिए कि विनेश "महादानव" से उसी फोन पर "बलात्कारी भूषण" का इंसाफ़ मांग लेती तो कितना बड़ा भूकंप आ सकता था?  ★★ या'नि मा'मला "महादानव" के ग़ुरूर, ख़ौफ़ और सियासी भूचाल के इर्दगिर्द घूम रहा था.."महादानव" के लिए विनेश एक "चक्रव्यूह" बन गई थी..  ● साज़िश के पहले हिस्से से ज़्यादा साज़िश के दूसरे हिस्से को तैयार करना था..पहले हिस्से में विनेश को हराना था जो कि आसान था..  ● पर साज़िश के दूसरे हिस्से में "गांधी हत्यारों" को "गांधी पूजा" की एक्टिंग करनी थी..जैसे आज कल ये हत्यारे गांधी पूजक बने हुए हैं ठीक वैसे ही विनेश को "देश का गर्व" बताने की एक्टिंग करने लगे..  👉 हम हिंदुस्तानी वैसे भी जज़्बाती होते हैं..जहां कोई 2 बूंद आंसू बहा रहा होता है वहां हम आंसूओं का समुंदर बहा देते हैं..  ✋ साज़िशन विनेश को "ट्रेजेडी क्वीन" बना दिया गया..पूरा हिंदुस्तान रो रहा है..और ऐसे ही एक साज़िश को आंसूओं में बहा दिया गया, छुपा दिया गया..

simpleText: टूल किट यही है कि वो सिस्टम से लड़ है। पूरा विपक्ष इसी टूल किट का इस्तमाल कर रहा है। तीसरे ओलंपिक में गई है विनेश। 2 बार बाहर हुई है। सिस्टम से कैसे लड़ी है इसी सिस्टम से गई है। इसी देश की सुविधा से विदेश में ट्रेनिंग ली है। इसी देश का डेलिगेशन साथ गया है। फिर कौनसे सिस्टम से लड़ी है।  हाआं बिना जीते जब खुद को देश से संग़ठन से बड़ा सोचा तो जरूर लोग खिलाफ हुवे। उसके बाद भी प्रॉपर ट्रायल हुवे। और बाकी जो पहलवान बैठे थे सब ट्रायल देकर बाहर हुवे। विनेश ने मेहनत करी। वेट कम किया दूसरे वेट में लड़ी और जीती। औऱ ओलंपिक में गई । इस दौरान कौनसा सिस्टम उसके आड़े आया।  छोटे से प्रदर्शन या बगावत से खिलाड़ियों का कैरियर बर्बाद होते देखे है।लेकिन इसी सिस्टम से वो ओलंपिक में सब सुविधा के साथ खेल रही है। सिस्टम मिन्स सरकार और सरकार मिन्स देश।क्योकि उसे जनता चुनती है और वो किसी एक कि नही होती उसी का सिस्टम होता है। तो कौनसे सिस्टम से लड़ी विनेश ???  उसकी लड़ाई खुद से थी,उसकी अनुशासन हीनता,किसी को कुछ न समझने की ,कुश्ती संगठन की बातें भी न मानने से थी। क्योकि जिस परिवार से आई थी उसमे पहले कुश्ती के स्टार थे। और इसलिए वो घमंड आना जायज होता है। लेकिन जब दिल्ली की सड़कों पर वो घमंड टूटा तो वो खुद से लड़ी। और अपने नाम के लिये लड़ी और आज जीत रही है तो वो खुद को गिफ्ट करेगी इस मेडल को । सिस्टम उसके पहले भी साथ आज भी है। हाआं आपकी जातिवादी कुंठा शांत होती है तो आप सिस्टम से लड़ी बोलो या जिससे भी बोलो।  उस लड़की की ने किसी समाज को गाली नही दी।समाजों ने आपस मे दी।और उसके नाम से आज फिर बीजेपी के समर्थकों के साथ राजपूत और ब्राह्मणों को जी भरके गाली दी जा रही है। कोई  उसे बृजभूषण के नाम से दे देता है तो कोई सीधे। भारत सब देख रहा है राजनीति में क्या किया जा रहा है। आपके गलत मर कोई साथ न दे तो दूसरों को गाली दी जा रही है।  और शुरुवात उधर से होती है जो जातिवाद के जन्मदाता है। इस नफरत के लिये शुक्रिया । इससे लोग मजबूत होते है आपको लगता है सिर्फ विनेश मजबूत हुई है। इससे समाज भी मजबूत होते है। उन्हें भी पता चलता है कि उनके लिये क्या सोच विकसित करी जा रही है। एक रहिये एक जुट रहिये हाआं किसी की बहन बेटी को गाली देकर जाहिल मत बनिये । वो सांझी होती है।..
author: @Missionmasti

simpleText: चलो अब सिस्टम फाड़ देंगे के क्रांतिकारी लोगो पर बात करते है। वैसे तो ये हमेशा चित भी मेरी पट भी मेरी रखते है। इन लोगो को मोदी फोबियो है। मैंने ऐसे ऐसे लोग देखे है जो सुबह उठते ही जिम में जाते है और लिखते है कंहा है र वो 56 इंच। और वँहा 100 आदमी बोलते मिलेंगे की भाई कति स्वाद आ गया। धो दिया ढोंगी। आप मानके चलिये ये ऐसे क्रांतिकारी है दिनभर में ये 100 गाली मोदी को न दे ले तो इनको नींद नही आती।  इनके कब्जी हो जाये तो इसमें दोष मोदी का लगता है। चलो अब बात करते ह इनके दोगलापन पर। 26 जनवरी को लाल किले पर हुड़दंग हुआ तो ये लोग मोदी के साथ दीप सिधु का फोटो वायरल करने लगे कि साजिश है बदनाम करने की। और 2 महीने बाद ही उस दीप सिधु को सच्चा सिपाही बता रहे थे। ऐसे बहुत मामले है।क्रांतिकारी बने है ये लेकिन सही मायने में गंवार है।जिन्हें शोशल मीडिया पर कुछ लोग वाहवाही करने वाले मिल गए है।  ताजा मामले पर बात करे तो इनके अनुसार सिस्टम से लड़कर और हराकर विनेश आगे गई थी। इसमें सरकार का कोई हाथ और सहयोग नही था। अब जैसे ही बाहर हो गई तो ये बोल रहे है सरकार की साजिश है। अरे दोगलो एक जगह तो टिक जाओ। ऐसी भी क्या क्रांति जो मुंह से बोला ही भूल जाते हो ।  सिस्टम  बहुत मजबूत होता है,अगर सरकार सच मे अपनी पर आए तो कम से कम खिलाड़ी तो आगे नही बढ़ सकता नेशनल मात्र से। आजकल पॉइंट गेम है कुछ भी कभी भी करवा दो। इस सिस्टम में रहकर ही तीन बार विनेश ने ओलंपिक खेला है।उसकी ट्रेनिंग पर लाखों खर्च हुवे है। 53 kg में हारने के बाद विनेश ने 50 वाली कुश्ती उसी दिन खेली तब खुद हल्ला कर रहे थे। लेकिन सिस्टम साथ था।  सिस्टम से विनेश आगे ओलंपिक तक गई थी,हाआं वो देश की बेस्ट थी लेकिन सिस्टम से लड़कर कोई नही जा सकता। तो बाहर निकलो मोदी फोबियो से। वो छपरी नही तुमहारे जैसे कि उसे किसी खिलाड़ी में इतनी दिलचस्पी हो। वो जीतने पर भी बात करता है हारने पर भी। मत कुंठित होइए।  वजन 100 gm नही बढा था 2 kg फालतू था। और जब खिलाड़ी  उसे कम करके खेलता है तो उसे उसे मेंटेन करना होता है। शरीर से वेट कम कर दोगे तो एक समय ऐसा आएगा 10 gm भी कम नही होगा। हमने करवाये है वेट लड़के को भगाया दौड़ाया बेंड रखा पैर दीवार पर रखे,कम्बल डाल के धूप में लिटाया। 200 gm नही तुड़वा पाये। क्योकि हफ्ते भर में 5 kg तुड़वा दिया था अब क्या कोई अंग काट करके कम करते  पानी पिलाना बन्द कर देते है जब वेट कम करना हो, गोली ऐसे देते है कि दिन भर पेशाब ही करता रहे ताकि एकबार वेट तो हो जाये। फिर चाहे कुछ खा लेगा। इसलिए बोलते है खिलाड़ी का जीवन तपस्या है वो इतना आसान नही है। लेकिन कोई प्रधानमंत्री इन सब मे इन्वॉल होगा ये आपका मोदी फोबियो है आप जितनी जल्दी इससे बाहर आ जाएंगे स्वस्थ रहेंगे। अच्छा फील करेंगे।
author: @Missionmasti

simpleText: भारत के नागरिक द्वारा  भारत के नागरिकों के लिए                        "हमारा भारत महान " हमारा भारत महान हे,   लेकिन कुछ कमियां हर जगह होती हैं या उन कमियों को पता करके सुधरने से  महानता  और  भी बहुत ज्यादा बढ़ जाती  हैं,  ""इसमे महिला सुरक्षा " भी एक मुद्दा है हमें अतीत से सीखना चाहिए लेकिन हम कहीं ना कहीं कमी कर रहे हैं चाहे "दिल्ली रेप कैश " हो या "हाथरस कांड " या फिर अभी हुआ बंगाल में "डॉक्टर महिला" के साथ हुआ, पता है ये जो  घटनाएं हे , हमारी लड़ाई  किसी एक अकेले आदमी से नही है  उनमें एक जैसे मांशिकता वाले लोग होते हैं, जिनको बचपन में सही दिशा ना मिले हो उसके साथ ही गलत दिशा मिली हो , ये एक घटनाए विचार  धारा की लड़ाई  है उसको सुधारा जा सकता  है ! एक दूसरी विचार धारा ह्ने ,  वो कई गुना बड़ी   और ताकतवर है वो  है हमारी।  हमे अपने  वर्तमान में   और  भविष्य के लिय जमीनी स्तर पर काम करना एवं  अतीत से सीखना ही होगा , कि हम कितना ही विरोध करले  सोशल मीडिया को समय के साथ भूल ही जायेगे  लेकिन हम इश्को  हथ्यार के रूप तरह इस्तेमाल करके जहा तक आवाज बहुचा सकते ह्ने,  बहुचायेगे हम भूल ही जाते हैं ,"शिक्षा  ऐशा हथियार ह्ने !  जिससे   हम दुनिया बदल सकते हैं "ये एक सच्चाई यह है कि हमें भविष्य के लिए शिक्षा को उपकरण बनाना होगा,  "एडवाइस "  हमें हर शिक्षक को प्रशिक्षित करना होगा या विशिष्ट शिक्षक मनोविज्ञान का हर विद्यालय में रखना होगा   जो गहन रूप से  समझा सके  जैसे कि  लड़कियां और लड़के समान हैं,   लड़कियों की प्रति केशा व्यवहार !  व्यावहारिक रूप से वहां मन को ठीक करना , इत्यादि !      उनके  माता-पिता को भी मार्गदर्शन प्रदान करना जैसे  हम जानते हैं शिखर का आधार मजबूत होना ही  चाहिए एवं जो  स्कूल, कॉलेज से ऊपर उठ  चुके  विशिष्ट आयु के लोगों की सोच को बदल ना थोड़ा कठिन होगा, तो हमें इस के  के लिये "   शिक्षा , "मनोविज्ञान   और "भय बिन ना होत ना प्रीत"  (दण्ड प्रक्रिया)  भी उपयोग कर सकते हैं  एक संगठन बना सकते हैं जो जमीनी स्तर पर  केवल स्कूल कॉलेज,  यूनिवेसिटी पर नजर रखे    एव    एक शिक्षक, और मनोवैज्ञानिक  प्रदान करता  सुनिश्चित करे ,  jitra हो सके उतना हो सके उतना अपडेट लेटा रहे, यूनिवर्सिटी, स्कूल, कॉलेज और सोसाइटी में हो रे बदलावो पर नजर रख सके या कुछ बुरा होने से पहले ही  रुका जा साके,  जो समाज में   ऐसे स्पेसिफिक लोगो पर नजर रख सकता हो ,  जरूरत के हिसाब से सजा भी दे सकता हों , हर साल मॉनिटर करके पिछले साल की तुलना भी कर सकता हों ,कितना बदलाव आ रे हे .   कामिया किया  है  किया किया जा सकता हैं इत्यादि !  यहां भी  कमियां जरूर होगी जितना हम अच्छे से फॉलो करेंगे उतने ही अच्छे परिणाम मिलेंगे या फिर कुछ कम अच्छे होंगे,    हमें  एक कदम आगे बढ़ना ही होगा,  लेकिन सकारात्मक रहें।   ये खात किशी धर्म जाति राज्य या किशे राजनीतिक पार्टी से मिला नहीं है। हर राज्य इसके लिए पात्र है यह भारत के हर राज्य के लिए है क्योंकि यह इसके अंतर्गत आता है दिल्ली को छोड़कर भारत के नागरिकों के लिए कानून और व्यवस्था बनाए रखना अलग-अलग राज्यों की जिम्मेदारी है, यह मुद्दा नहीं है कि कौन सा राज्य किस पार्टी का है। यह भारत के नागरिकों के लिए है। भारतीय नागरिकों द्वारा !   जय हिंद . भारत के नागरिक द्वारा।🙏🏻

simpleText: ध्रुव राठी का चैनल, सच्चाई का दीप, फैक्ट्स और जानकारी, हर बात में गहरी तिप। सच का सफर, बिना किसी छुपाव के, जानकारी की दुनिया, हर वीडियो में बसा है।  समाज की परतें, एक-एक कर खोलते, सच्चाई की रौशनी, हर तथ्य में ढालते। ध्रुव राठी के साथ, ज्ञान का होता प्रकाश, हर वीडियो में छिपा, जीवन का सच्चा आभास।

simpleText: I received my SE role offer letter from Infosys in 2022 and, trusting the company's reputation, I declined other job offers, waiting over a year for a joining date. During that time, the IT sector faced a recession, making it hard to find new opportunities. After nearly two years, Infosys finally contacted me in June 2024 for pre-training, which I completed on July 24. We were promised joining dates of August 19 or September 2. However, instead of receiving results, I was sent an email about re-pre-training starting on August 26. This has left me stressed, confused, and unsure about my future. Can anyone clarify what Infosys is planning, and why we're being put through this again?
author: @anshulshrivastava1908

simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @sujeetkumar7742

Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.

simpleText: I received my SE role offer letter from Infosys in 2022 and, trusting the company's reputation, I declined other job offers, waiting over a year for a joining date. During that time, the IT sector faced a recession, making it hard to find new opportunities. After nearly two years, Infosys finally contacted me in June 2024 for pre-training, which I completed on July 24. We were promised joining dates of August 19 or September 2. However, instead of receiving results, I was sent an email about re-pre-training starting on August 26. This has left me stressed, confused, and unsure about my future. Can anyone clarify what Infosys is planning, and why we're being put through this again?
author: @anshulshrivastava1908

simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @itvidoe6673

simpleText: I received my SE role offer letter from Infosys in 2022 and, trusting the company's reputation, I declined other job offers, waiting over a year for a joining date. During that time, the IT sector faced a recession, making it hard to find new opportunities. After nearly two years, Infosys finally contacted me in June 2024 for pre-training, which I completed on July 24. We were promised joining dates of August 19 or September 2. However, instead of receiving results, I was sent an email about re-pre-training starting on August 26. This has left me stressed, confused, and unsure about my future. Can anyone clarify what Infosys is planning, and why we're being put through this again?
author: @anshulshrivastava1908

simpleText: I received my SE role offer letter from Infosys in 2022 and, trusting the company's reputation, I declined other job offers, waiting over a year for a joining date. During that time, the IT sector faced a recession, making it hard to find new opportunities. After nearly two years, Infosys finally contacted me in June 2024 for pre-training, which I completed on July 24. We were promised joining dates of August 19 or September 2. However, instead of receiving results, I was sent an email about re-pre-training starting on August 26. This has left me stressed, confused, and unsure about my future. simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.

Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @itvidoe6673

simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @AnujYadav-mc8nh

simpleText: I received my SE role offer letter from Infosys in 2022 and, trusting the company's reputation, I declined other job offers, waiting over a year for a joining date. During that time, the IT sector faced a recession, making it hard to find new opportunities. After nearly two years, Infosys finally contacted me in June 2024 for pre-training, which I completed on July 24. We were promised joining dates of August 19 or September 2. However, instead of receiving results, I was sent an email about re-pre-training starting on August 26. This has left me stressed, confused, and unsure about my future. Can anyone clarify what Infosys is planning, and why we’re being put through this again?
author: @deepdarksquite9933

Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.

simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.

simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @juliasbiswas0001

simpleText: I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @snehashilvant

simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.

simpleText: ध्रुव राठी के बारे में ब्रेकिंग द्रुथ जो हिंदू का मुखौटा पहनकर मोदी-विरोधी, बीजेपी-विरोधी,  उनका असली नाम बदरू रशीद, पूरा नाम बदरुद्दीन रशीद लाहौरी है।  उनका जन्म लाहौर, पाकिस्तान में हुआ था और उनकी पत्नी जूली (ईसाई लगने वाला नाम) भी पाकिस्तानी हैं, जिनका असली नाम जुलेखा (स्पष्ट रूप से मुस्लिम नाम) है।  पूँछ  वे कराची में विश्व प्रसिद्ध और कुख्यात गैंगस्टर दाऊद इब्राहिम के गुप्त अलीशान बंगले में रहते हैं जहां उन्हें आईएसआई और पाकिस्तानी सेना की Y+ और Z+ सुरक्षा प्रदान की जाती है। बदरू रशीद (ध्रुव राठी के रूप में फर्जीवाड़ा) की फंडिंग पाकिस्तान, चीन, दुबई, मालदीव, कनाडा, रूस, तुर्की और पेंडोरा से होती है।  मोदी का विरोध करने के लिए जॉर्ज सोरोस के खाते से पेसा को फंड भेजा जाता है।  लेकिन अब इस हिंदू विरोधी भारत विरोधी तत्व का भंडाफोड़ हो गया है।  इस बात का खुलासा इजरायली खुफिया एजेंसी मोसाद ने अपनी खुफिया रिपोर्ट में किया है।  सभी सनातनी कृपया इस खुलासे को अधिक से अधिक शेयर करें और बदरू रशीद की सच्चाई बताएं

simpleText: साइना नेहवाल ने उस जाति में शादी की है जो उन दो प्रमुख समुदायों में से एक है जिन्होंने पहलवानों और किसानों के संघर्ष करने पर  उनकी आलोचना की और गालियां दी  उनके साथ दुर्व्यवहार किया। (यहां मुद्दा उनके पति या उनके परिवार के खिलाफ नहीं है, वे अच्छे लोग हो सकते हैं)। वह भूल गई होगी कि जब वह अंतरराष्ट्रीय मैच खेलती थी तो  उसके साथ भी उन्होंने ऐसा ही किया था। जब भी वह अंतरराष्ट्रीय टूर्नामेंटों में हारती थी तो प्रमुख राष्ट्रीय समाचार पत्रों में उसकी बिखरी हुई खराब फोटो को चापा जाता था। जब तक वह सेमीफ़ाइनल में नहीं पहुंच जाति थी।  उसकी न्यूज नहीं प्रिंट करते थे।  वह भूल गई उसे मानसिक रूप से प्रताड़ित किया जाता था ।  क्या साइना भूल गई  कि पिछले 3-4 वर्षों में  राष्ट्रीय समाचार पत्रों और राष्ट्रीय टीवी चैनलों ने उस्को पूरी तरह से अंधेरे  में रखा है और ये लोग हर समय केवल पी वी सिंधु को बढ़ावा दे रहे थे, तब भी, जब वह अपनी गेम बुरी तरह हार   जाती थी।     वे अपने पसंदीदा समुदायों के खिलाड़ियों के  अभ्यास करने की खबरें देना पसंद करते हैं,ना कि उसका । वे अपने पसंदीदा खिलाड़ी जिन्होंने कई साल पहले कुछ पदक जीते थे या कुछ अजनबी अन्य देशों के खिलाड़ियों के बारे में समाचार फ्लैश करना पसंद करेंगे।        वही लोग अब उसकी प्रशंसा कर रहे हैं क्योंकि विनेश फोगाट पेरिस से लौटने के बाद उनके लिए एक राजनीतिक चुनौती बन गई हैं क्योंकि उसके अपने समुदाय ने पेरिस ओलंपिक में प्रतिद्वंद्वी समुदायों द्वारा विनेश के खिलाफ की गई साजिश के खिलाफ  पूरा समर्थन किया है।    वही लोग अब उसकी प्रशंसा इसलिए कर रहे हैं क्योंकि पेरिस से लौटने पर, प्रतिद्वंद्वियों द्वारा विनेश फोगाट पर की गई साजिश के खिलाफ विनेश  के पीछे  उसके समुदाय की पूरी एकजुटता, उस पार्टी के लिए एक राजनीतिक चुनौती बन गई है जिसमें वह अब शामिल हो गई हैं।
author: @NarendraKumar-ts1bf

simpleText: मेरा देस बदल रह है आगे बढ़ रहा है 🥰❣️ एक भईसाब ने बताया कि अपना ग़ज़ब का देश है...! यहाँ, जिन्होंने ओलंपिक में मेडल जीते.... वे, शांतिपूर्वक अपने घर गए....जो डिस्क्वालीफाई होकर बाहर हो गए... वे,जुलूस निकलवा रहे है..!! जो बेइज्जती हुई है इसकी जिम्मेदार खुद विनेश हैं। 2016 से विनेश 53KG में खेलती थी।  अब इस बात पर गोर कीजिए 👇🏻👇🏻👇🏻  मार्च 2024 में भारत में ओलंपिक ट्रायल के दौरान 53KG वर्ग में अपने जूनियर अंजू से 0-10 से हारी थी और जबरन हंगामा करके 50KG वर्ग में उसी दिन ट्रायल देकर शिवानी को हराया और क्वालीफाई किया था ओलंपिक के लिए। ✅✅ 50KG वर्ग के पहलवानों ने इसका विरोध किया था लेकिन विनेश का हंगामा भारी पड़ा और फेडरेशन को विनेश की नाजायज मांग के सामने झुकना पड़ा। आज परिणाम आ गया उस जिद का। अगर 50KG में ही खेलना था तो वेट मेंटेन करना चाहिए था। ✅✅✅✅✅

simpleText: We want justice  We want job  It’s a biggest job scam by Infosys pvt ltd   Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @TheAnmolvlogs-ih8ds

On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @lavanyakavya6468

simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,   I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.   I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.   Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.   To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.   I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.   I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.   Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.    Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.   Thanks and Regards,  Dipti Patil

simpleText: Hello Dhruv Rathee Team,  I hope this email finds you well. i am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with onboarding process at infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening. I was selected for the system engineer role at infosys limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2000 other students were selected for SE(System Engineer) and DSE(Digital Specialist Engineer) roles during 2022-2023. Many candidates, including my self, rejected offers from other companies to work at infosys.  Also, I've completed my internship program at infosys in 2022 and on the time of onboarding my final semester result wasn't declared so I've to extend my DOJ, since then no updates from infosys till now. if we mailed them about DOJ they revert a system generated mail that is " Your DOJ will be based on our business requirements." I,ve attached the Snapshot in this mail.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, some of the candidayes asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  And on the other hand most of the candidates doesn't get any type of email like pre training and all and if we mail  them about the update of rejoining they revert the auto generated mail that is "joining will be based on business requirement." For 2 years.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.

simpleText: Hi sir, hope you are well, I am a Bangladeshi citizen, I want your original opinion on the below mentioned topic, and an unbiased video on this topic.  Every year during the dry season, the Indian government shuts off the rivers flowing between Bangladesh and India, which dries up Bangladesh's rivers, affecting Bangladesh's agricultural industry and reducing crop production.    On the other hand, when the rivers of Bangladesh are full of water during the monsoon, India pushes the stored water towards Bangladesh during the dry season, thereby affecting the people of Bangladesh.    Many people die, India takes maximum advantage of all aspects of such losses in Bangladesh, as the agricultural industry of Bangladesh is weakened due to lack of water during the dry season, resulting in reduced crop production, due to scarcity.   To produce crops according to demand, food has to be imported into the country, followed by potatoes.    Bangladesh surrendered to India for various food items including onion, garlic, rice dal, then when Bangladesh did not need water, India drowned Bangladesh by releasing water to Bangladesh.      This is how India has been extracting maximum benefits from Bangladesh by withholding water during the dry season for ages.
author: @user-gz8yy7ip4s

simpleText: Dear Dhruv Rathi team,  I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring your attention to an ongoing issue I have been facing with the onboarding process at Infosys, which has become increasingly frustrating and disheartening.  I was selected for the System Engineer role at Infosys Limited in 2022. Along with me, more than 2,000 other students were selected for SE and DSE roles during 2022-23. Many candidates, including myself, rejected offers from other companies to work at Infosys. Unfortunately, after our selection, the joining process has been continuously delayed for nearly two years.  Earlier this year, after the prolonged delay, we were asked to participate in an unpaid virtual pre-training program from July 1, 2024, to July 24, 2024. On the first day of training, the HR team (Sudhir Mishra and Komal Papdeja) assured us that an assessment would be conducted on July 24, and based on the results, our joining would be finalized by August 19 or September 2. Despite these assurances, I did not receive any communication regarding my results, even after waiting for more than 20 days.  To my surprise, I was later informed that I needed to retake the pre-training exam offline. This unexpected development has left me feeling frustrated and uncertain about the reliability of this process. Having invested over two years in anticipation of joining, only to be repeatedly delayed and subjected to further assessments, I am deeply concerned about the transparency and professionalism of the onboarding process.  I trusted that the onboarding process, initially promised to be conducted at the Mysore campus, would be handled with the utmost professionalism. Yet, despite fulfilling all requirements and expectations on my end, it feels as though my time and efforts have been disregarded.  I am now reaching out for clarity, justice, and a resolution to ensure that this situation does not continue to negatively impact me or others in a similar position. My hope is that Infosys will recognize the significant impact this delay has had on me and take the necessary steps to address it promptly.  Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and a resolution to this issue.   Some other big mnc's are also doing these delay things with candidates from last two years.
author: @Sri-d5i

simpleText: Make video on reservation Creamy layer subcategorization   Reservation was never just about FINANCIAL STATUS; it's about addressing deep-rooted SOCIAL DISCRIMINATION.  Some believe that DISCRIMINATION only happens in rural areas, but this isn't true. I've personally experienced it in URBAN SETTINGS, where people MOCK LOWER-CASTE individuals and use DEROGATORY LANGUAGE. I've seen classmates RIDICULE students simply because they were SC, ST or PHYSICALLY HANDICAPPED.  Ironically, these same people call for an end to RESERVATIONS, ignoring the very discrimination that JUSTIFIES them. They argue that CASTE-BASED DISCRIMINATION is a thing of the past, yet their actions-like OPPOSING INTERCASTE MARRIAGES- suggest otherwise. EDUCATED FAMILIES still REJECT marriage proposals based solely on CASTE, proving that these PREJUDICES persist.  Some say RESERVATIONS should be based on ECONOMIC STATUS alone, but this overlooks the CENTURIES of SOCIAL INJUSTICE faced by MARGINALIZED COMMUNITIES.  Discrimination isn't just about MONEY; it's about DIGNITY, RESPECT, and EQUAL OPPORTUNITY. Discrimination also manifests in SUBTLE WAYS-like being OVERLOOKED FOR PROMOTIONS or facing MICROAGGRESSIONS daily. These experiences are often DISMISSED by those who've never faced them.  So, why do some want both:  Το DISCRIMINATE and TO END RESERVATION?  If they truly believe discrimination is over, they should start by addressing their own BIASES. Until then, RESERVATIONS remain not just VALID but ESSENTIAL.

simpleText: Dear Sir Ji,I am writing to bring to your urgent attention a grave issue concerning the Community Health Officers (CHOs) of the UP NHM, who are currently on strike at the NHM office in Lucknow.These CHOs, many of whom are young women, have been tirelessly working in various districts far from their homes. After joining the department unmarried, many of them have now settled into married life. However, the absence of a transfer policy within the UP NHM has left them stranded in districts far from their sasural, causing significant personal and family distress.These women are not just facing isolation in unfamiliar cities with inadequate salaries, but are also vulnerable to exploitation and harassment by NHM officers. The lack of support and a clear transfer policy is taking a severe toll on their mental and emotional well-being, leading to extreme cases where some have tragically taken their own lives.This is a serious issue that demands immediate attention. I urge you to use your platform to bring this to light and advocate for these women, who are in desperate need of a fair and humane transfer policy. They need your voice to ensure their safety and dignity.Thank you for considering this crucial issue.
author: @SANTRAM-rw5ur

simpleText: Saina Nehwal has married in a caste who were one of the two prime communities who criticized and abused wrestlers & farmers when they were protesting. She must have forgotten that they also did the same thing to her when she played internationals. Every time she lost in international tournaments they used to give blow ups of her shattered images in leading national news papers. They didn't flash her victories till she reached semi-finals. They are praising her now because vinesh has become a political challenge for them since your own community has shown full backing to her against conspiracy committed on her by rivals communities at Paris Olympics.        Saina has forgotten when she was on peak of her career a movie was proposed to be made on her with then top actress Sharadha kapoor but these very rivals of her community had forced the producer and actress to back off from the venture and the proposed movie was put in deep cold storage. It was only when her fame faded a movie was allowed to be made with a mid level heroine. By then people were not interested in seeing it.
author: @NarendraKumar-ts1bf

simpleText: साइना नेहवाल ने उस जाति में शादी की है जो उन दो प्रमुख समुदायों में से एक है जिन्होंने पहलवानों और किसानों के संघर्ष करने पर  उनकी आलोचना की और गालियां दी  उनके साथ दुर्व्यवहार किया। वह भूल गई होगी कि जब वह अंतरराष्ट्रीय मैच खेलती थी तो  उसके साथ भी उन्होंने ऐसा ही किया था। जब भी वह अंतरराष्ट्रीय टूर्नामेंटों में हारती थी तो प्रमुख राष्ट्रीय समाचार पत्रों में उसकी बिखरी हुई खराब फोटो को चापा जाता था। जब तक वह सेमीफ़ाइनल में नहीं पहुंच जाति थी।  उसकी न्यूज नहीं प्रिंट करते थे।  वह भूल गई उसे मानसिक रूप से प्रताड़ित किया जाता था ।        वही लोग अब उसकी प्रशंसा कर रहे हैं क्योंकि विनेश फोगाट उनके लिए एक राजनीतिक चुनौती बन गई हैं क्योंकि उसके अपने समुदाय ने पेरिस ओलंपिक में प्रतिद्वंद्वी समुदायों द्वारा विनेश के खिलाफ की गई साजिश के खिलाफ  पूरा समर्थन किया है।    साइना भूल गई हैं कि जब वह अपने करियर के शिखर पर थीं तो उस समय की  प्रसिद्ध अभिनेत्री शरदा कपूर के साथ उस पर एक फिल्म बनाने का प्रस्ताव रखा गया था, लेकिन उसके समुदाय के इन्हीं प्रतिद्वंद्वियों ने निर्माता और अभिनेत्री को इस फिल्म से पीछे हटने के लिए मजबूर कर दिया था और प्रस्तावित फिल्म को दफ़न कर दिया था ।  जब उसकी प्रसिद्धि फीकी पड़ गई तभी मध्य स्तर की नायिका के साथ फिल्म बनाने की अनुमति दी गई। तब तक लोगों को इसे देखने में कोई दिलचस्पी नहीं थी ।
author: @NarendraKumar-ts1bf

simpleText: 2)-   साइना नेहवाल इस बात से नाराज होंगी कि उसकी ही जाति के लोगों ने उसके समय में विनेश फोगाट की तरह सम्मान नहीं दिया। उसे पता होना चाहिए उसकी अपनी जाति के लोग पहले मानसिक रूप से सो रहे थे। उनको भैंसों की तरह उसका बचाव करने की समझ नहीं थी।  अब वे कुछ बुद्धिजीवियों के उकसावे पर धीरे-धीरे जागृत हो रहे हैं। हालाँकि, उनमें से कई का व्यवहार अभी भी जंगली भैंसों जैसा है। वे अपने ही लोगों पर हमला कर सकते हैं जिन्होंने उन्हें सही दिशा में जाने की सलाह दी होगी। कुछ लोग अभी भी जंगली भैंसों (भैंसों) की तरह प्रतिक्रिया करते हैं, जो उन्हें दी गई अच्छी और समझदार सलाह को आलोचना के रूप में लेते हैं। साइना के समुदाय में एक कहावत है कि "गधे की आंख में घी डाला, गधा बोला फोड़ दी आंख"। अब साइना एक ऐसी पार्टी में शामिल हो गयी है जिसमें मुख्य रूप से वो लोग शामिल हैं जो अभी भी साइना के समुदाय के लोगों और उनके खिलाड़ियों और कृषि नेताओं की आलोचना और दुर्व्यवहार करते हैं। साइना गीता फोगाट, चौटाला आदि की तरह अपने समुदाय की  जयचंद बन गयी है।
author: @NarendraKumar-ts1bf

simpleText: 2)- साइना नेहवाल भूल गई हैं कि जब वह अपने करियर के शिखर पर थीं तो उस समय की  प्रसिद्ध अभिनेत्री शरदा कपूर के साथ उस पर एक फिल्म बनाने का प्रस्ताव रखा गया था, लेकिन उसके समुदाय के इन्हीं प्रतिद्वंद्वियों ने निर्माता और अभिनेत्री को इस फिल्म से पीछे हटने के लिए मजबूर कर दिया था और प्रस्तावित फिल्म को दफ़न कर दिया था ।  जब उसकी प्रसिद्धि फीकी पड़ गई तभी मध्य स्तर की नायिका के साथ फिल्म बनाने की अनुमति दी गई। तब तक लोगों को इसे देखने में कोई दिलचस्पी नहीं थी ।     साइना  इस बात से नाराज होंगी कि उसकी ही जाति के लोगों ने उसके समय में विनेश फोगाट की तरह सम्मान नहीं दिया। उसे पता होना चाहिए उसकी अपनी जाति के लोग पहले मानसिक रूप से सो रहे थे। उनको भैंसों की तरह उसका बचाव करने की समझ नहीं थी।  अब वे कुछ बुद्धिजीवियों के उकसावे पर धीरे-धीरे जागृत हो रहे हैं। हालाँकि, उनमें से कई का व्यवहार अभी भी जंगली भैंसों जैसा है। वे अपने ही लोगों पर हमला कर सकते हैं जिन्होंने उन्हें सही दिशा में जाने की सलाह दी होगी। कुछ लोग अभी भी जंगली भैंसों (भैंसों) की तरह प्रतिक्रिया करते हैं, जो उन्हें दी गई अच्छी और समझदार सलाह को आलोचना के रूप में लेते हैं। साइना के समुदाय में एक कहावत है कि "गधे की आंख में घी घाला, गधा बोला फोड़ दी आंख"। अब साइना एक ऐसी पार्टी में शामिल हो गयी है जिसमें मुख्य रूप से वो लोग शामिल हैं जो अभी भी साइना के समुदाय के लोगों और उनके खिलाड़ियों और कृषि नेताओं की आलोचना और दुर्व्यवहार करते हैं। साइना गीता फोगाट, चौटाला आदि की तरह अपने समुदाय की एक और जयचंद बन गयी है।

Uske upar se ye bolna ki Central Government ne koi support ni diya , CONGRESS ne support diya , IOC ne conspiracy ki jabki IOC to vinesh ke weight measurement aane ke turant baad , Olympics pe vote of consideration bhejti hai Vinesh Should be awarded with Silver , uske baad bhi ye blame , shame. simpleText: मैं जुलाना से हूं। आप हर एक गांव का विनेश का इलेक्शनcompaign वीडियो देखिए कैसे खासकर औरतें, बच्चे, जवान, बूढ़े भारी संख्या में लोग स्वागत कर रहे हैं। जैसे विनेश फोगाट ने जनता पर कोई जादू कर दिया हो। हर गांव के सभी ट्रैक्टर उनके स्वागत के लिए काफ़िले में आगे चलते हैं। हर औरत उसको आशीर्वाद देना चाहती है। विनेश एक सुनामी बन चुकी है पॉपुलैरिटी में। रिकॉर्ड मतों से जीत दर्ज करेगी। बेटियों की शुरुक्षा और सुविधाओ का प्रथम वचन देती है। 8 octo को result देखना।
